simulation.title: The Ghost in the Machine
simulation.description: You aren't just reading about The Grove. You are already inside it.
simulation.targetAha: The Terminal is a single-node village. I am the proof of concept.

stakes.title: The $380 Billion Bet
stakes.description: Follow the money. Why Big Tech is spending GDP-level capital to own your future.
stakes.targetAha: If you don't own the infrastructure, you are the product.

ratchet.title: The Ratchet
ratchet.description: Why AI capability is doubling every 7 months—and why you're 21 months behind.
ratchet.targetAha: The gap is constant, but the floor keeps rising. Ownership beats renting when the floor is high enough.

diary.title: The Agent's Inner Voice
diary.description: How Grove agents develop memory, voice, and narrative identity through their diaries.
diary.targetAha: Diaries aren't logs. They're the mechanism through which agents develop selfhood.

architecture.title: Under the Hood
architecture.description: The technical architecture of distributed agent villages. For those who want to see the blueprints.
architecture.targetAha: This isn't theoretical. The architecture exists and runs on commodity hardware.

emergence.title: The Emergence Pattern
emergence.description: How capabilities appear in AI systems without being explicitly trained. Translation was the proof point.
emergence.targetAha: Emergence isn't magic—it's what happens when the observer finally asks the right question.
